caption: Table 1: Quantitative comparisons of the mean per-joint position error (MPJPE) on Human3.6M under Protocol #1.

Table 2: PA MPJPE comparison with state-of-the-art methods on the Human3.6M dataset using Protocol #2. The results of all 
approaches are obtained from the (Moon, Chang, and Lee 2019).

Table 3: Comparison of our approach on the MuPoTS-3D 
benchmark dataset. The metric used is 3D percentage of cor-
rect keypoints (3DPCK), so higher is better.
